Name: Adventure Dream Team
About the game: 《Adventure Dream Team》is a tower defense game, Choose three adventurers to search for treasures around the world,Protect the three adventurers from being defeated by the enemy. The three adventurers are the enemy's targets and movable turrets. Only by strategically defending and moving to pick up treasures can smooth customs clearance.
